title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Brian Kelly leaving Notre Dame to become the new head coach at LSU and why this move is about a lot more than just money. He believes the relationship between Pete Carroll and Russell Wilson is completely broken and it's time to try something new in the Pacific Northwest. He shares his top 10 teams in the NFL after week 12 in the Herd Hierarchy. Plus, new USC head coach Lincoln Riley joins the show to talk about his decision to leave Oklahoma and his plan to rebuild USC into a national power house.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
